description: This file defines a custom Flutter widget named OceanAppBar, which is a styled version of the AppBar with a modern look and subtle elevation.

classes.name: OceanAppBar
classes.description: A custom AppBar widget with a modern aesthetic, subtle elevation, and configurable title and actions.

methods.name: preferredSize
methods.description: Overrides the PreferredSizeWidget to specify the height of the AppBar.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the OceanAppBar, configuring its appearance and behavior.
